thread.title: Abbas says he backs 'peaceful' struggle against Israeli occupation - Region - World
thread.title_full: Abbas says he backs 'peaceful' struggle against Israeli occupation - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Abbas says he backs 'peaceful' struggle against Israeli occupation - Region - World
text:
Related Palestinians want UN to examine protection force Israeli police shoot dead Palestinian after alleged attack Picture of the day: Palestinian woman slingshots Israeli occupation soldiers Israel to set-up checkpoints in East Jerusalem; Palestinian general strikes in Bethlehem, Sakhneen Palestinian president Mahmoud Abbas said Wednesday he favours "peaceful, popular resistance" against Israeli occupation, amid a two-week wave of violence that has killed more than 30 people on both sides .
In a speech broadcast on official Palestinian television, his first since the outbreak of the violence, Abbas spoke of the Palestinian people's "right to defend ourselves" and "pursue our national struggle".
